sense.name: agreement
sense.commentary: a binding agreement between two or more persons that is enforceable by law
sense.examples: The contract stated that there would be no refund in the case of bad weather. The administration asked the teachers to sign a contract at the beginning of each year.

sense.name: declaration
sense.commentary: (contract bridge) the highest bid becomes the contract setting the number of tricks that the bidder must make
sense.examples: Bidding leads to various types of contracts. Search online for the official rules of contract bridge. I hate playing with George, he always doubles the contract without thinking, then we lose the game.
